p: The relationship between the number of flowers quantified during the fieldwork and the percentage of flower cover detected by the UAV was weak ( Figure 7 ). The highest values were found in the primary and stabilized dunes where the flights were performed at the peak of flowering (SD1 and SD2, Figure 7 ). Lowest and non-significant correlations were observed in those areas where UAV flights occurred after the peak of flowering (SD4 and SD5) or where A. longifolia invades the understory of pine forest (PF2, Figure 7 ).
